edu.psu.cse.siis.coal.field.transformers

Class FieldTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.psu.cse.siis.coal.field.transformers.FieldTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Internable<FieldTransformer>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IdentityFieldTransformer, NullFieldTransformer, ScalarReplace, SetFieldTransformer, TopFieldTransformer

    public abstract class FieldTransformer
extends Object
implements Internable<FieldTransformer>
    A field transformer, which models the influence of a statement of a single field.
